== Full Team Meetings ==

All meetings are held in '''#ubuntu-meeting''' on '''irc.libera.chat'''

Meetings are posted on the <nowiki>[[http://fridge.ubuntu.com/calendar|Fridge]]</nowiki>. '''Click <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/render?cid=j5q85mmi6ujvjtii5s1n3li5io%40group.calendar.google.com | here]]</nowiki> to subscribe.'''
* Google calendar will convert the time for you automatically if you subscribe, but the <nowiki>[[http://fridge.ubuntu.com/calendar|Fridge]]</nowiki> website will always show events in GMT.

=== Agenda Items ===

Feel free to add the topic you want to discuss in the next meeting. Feel free to give explanations below it if you are not sure of your presence.

==== Post-Meeting Tasks ====
* '''Keep <nowiki>[[BeginnersTeam-TeamReports]]</nowiki> updated.'''
* '''Update Next meeting time on the wiki'''
* '''Send meeting minutes to <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-beginners | ubuntu-beginners mailing list]]</nowiki>'''
* '''Clear the meeting agenda and topics in this page to use the page for the next meeting''' 

==== Steps to Schedule Next Meeting ====
These steps are to be performed after each meeting to ensure that all locations that mention the date of the next meeting are up-to-date

# Determine a date and time for the next meeting. Meetings normally happen every other Tuesday at 23:00 UTC in #ubuntu-meeting. The date/time can change to accommodate daylight savings time, major holidays, or other events that might prevent a large number of people from attending. If a different time is used for the meeting, be sure to check the <nowiki>[[http://fridge.ubuntu.com/calendar | Fridge]]</nowiki> and verify that there isn't a meeting already scheduled for that time. If there is, the meeting might need to be held in #ubuntu-beginners instead of #ubuntu-meeting.
# Update the /topic in #ubuntu-beginners to reflect the date/time of the next meeting
# Update the <nowiki>[[BeginnersTeam-Includes-Bulletin | wiki header]]</nowiki>. Be sure to update the timeanddate.com link url as well as the link text.
# Verify that the <nowiki>[[http://fridge.ubuntu.com/calendar | Fridge]]</nowiki> has the correct information for the upcoming meeting. If it does not have the correct information, remove the incorrect event, and <nowiki>[[Fridge-Calendar | add]]</nowiki> a new event with the correct information.
